generate-event.description: Wrapper around the 'sam local generate-event' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-generate-event.html)

invoke.description: Wrapper around the 'sam local invoke' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-invoke.html)

start-api.description: Wrapper around the 'sam local start-api' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-api.html)

start-lambda.description: Wrapper around the 'sam local start-lambda' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-lambda.html)
